product_name: Sierra Designs Clandestine Trench Coat - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Classic style meets contemporary fabric in the waterproof, breathable Sierra Designs Clandestine trench coat. Despite the secretive name, its understated, elegant style is sure to attract attention. Nylon fabric with waterproof, breathable coating blocks wind and rain so you stay dry even in wet weather. Fully taped seams keep rain from leaking in. Polyester taffeta lining is soft and slides easily over other fabrics. Exterior hand pockets; interior zip pocket; stowable, adjustable hood; adjustable rip-and-stick cuffs. Sierra Designs Clandestine trench coat belts at the waist, allowing a close, fitted look. Closeout.
short_description: Classic style meets contemporary fabric in the waterproof, breathable Sierra Designs Clandestine trench coat. Despite the secretive name, its understated, elegant style is sure to attract attention.
